questions.question:
In the anime 'Tokyo Revengers,' what is the name of the main protagonist?

A. Takemichi Hanagaki
B. Naoto Tachibana
C. Kazutora Hanemiya
D. Mikey

B. Emma Sano
C. Hina Amano
D. Saki Hanma

B. Valhalla

D. Tokyo Manji Gang
